activities.name: com.dimowner.audiorecorder.app.moverecords.MoveRecordsActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: displays an information dialog explaining move records functionality.
shows the title with placeholder for the number of records being managed.
triggers the action to move all audio records, potentially using a background service.
shows the count and storage location of the records currently loaded.
shows a list of moveable audio records for user interaction.
shows a message indicating no records are available when the list is empty.
shows a loading indicator while records are being fetched or processed.
animates in/out to show or hide the playback control panel from the bottom of the screen.
shows the current playback time during audio playback.
visualizes the waveform of the currently selected audio record.
indicates progress within the waveform visualization.
shows the name of the currently selected audio record.
displays the total duration of the currently selected audio record.
allows seeking through the audio playback by dragging the progress bar.
starts or resumes playback of the selected audio record.
stops the ongoing audio playback and resets the player panel.

activities.summary: This activity, MoveRecordsActivity, is used for managing and moving audio records. It provides functionalities like checking storage permissions, playing or stopping records, moving all records, opening the file location of a record, and displaying an info dialog. It also manages playback UI updates, handles lifecycle events to bind/unbind services and clean up resources, and dynamically updates UI elements such as RecyclerView and progress indicators.

activities.name: com.dimowner.audiorecorder.app.welcome.WelcomeActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: shows the introductory image to represent the app's theme or purpose.
presents the title of the application, which is 'Audio Recorder'.

static_properties.text: Welcome to a simple and fast application

dynamic_properties.effect: provides a brief description of the application to inform users about its simplicity and speed.
navigates the user to the next step in the app, typically the main functionality or setup screens.
ensures proper layout alignment by reserving space for navigation elements like the bottom navigation bar.

activities.summary: This activity serves as a welcome screen for the Audio Recorder application, introducing the app and providing a starting point for users with a 'Get started' button.

activities.name: com.dimowner.audiorecorder.app.trash.TrashActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Holds toolbar elements such as back button and title.
Navigates back to the previous activity.
Shows the title of the current screen ('Trash').
Triggers deletion of all items in the trash permanently.

static_properties.text: The records moved to the trash will be automatically removed forever in 60 days.

dynamic_properties.effect: Shows a list of deleted audio records with options to restore or delete.
Shows an empty state message indicating no items in the trash.

activities.summary: TrashActivity is responsible for displaying and managing audio records that have been moved to the trash. It provides functionality to delete all items, restore individual items, or permanently remove them. The UI reflects the current state of the trash (e.g., empty or containing items) and includes navigation and feedback mechanisms.

activities.name: com.dimowner.audiorecorder.app.browser.FileBrowserActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: navigates back by invoking onBackPressed
shows title of the activity as 'File browser'
shows or hides directory selection tabs based on user context or state
switches to private directory view directly
switches to public directory view after checking storage permissions
shows a progress panel during file import operations
shows import status message during file import operation

static_properties.text: Some records files was not found in the records directory. Possibly they was removed or moved.

dynamic_properties.effect: shows the current path of the selected directory or error message about missing files
shows list of audio records or files in the current directory
shows an empty state message when no files are available in the current directory
shows a progress bar during file loading or background operations

activities.summary: FileBrowserActivity is used to navigate and manage audio records in both private and public directories. It handles file browsing, import operations, record processing, permissions, and interactions with a database or adapter for displaying files. It also supports navigation to other activities for detailed record information.

activities.name: com.dimowner.audiorecorder.app.records.RecordsActivity
activities.summary: The RecordsActivity is used for managing and displaying audio records. It provides functionalities such as playing, bookmarking, deleting, sharing, renaming, sorting, and downloading records. It also handles multi-select operations, playback controls, UI animations, permission checks, and interactions with the underlying data via a presenter.

activities.name: com.dimowner.audiorecorder.app.settings.SettingsActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: finishes the current activity and navigates back to the previous screen.
shows a message indicating that migration of public storage records is required.

static_properties.text: Move public storage records is needed

dynamic_properties.effect: triggers an action related to viewing migrated public storage records.
initiates deletion or cleanup of public storage records.
opens the file browser to view stored recordings.
changes the application's UI theme color.

static_properties.text: Store records in a public dir

dynamic_properties.effect: switches between storing recordings in private or public directory.
shows the location path where recordings are stored.

static_properties.text: This feature is no longer available in Android 10 or higher.

dynamic_properties.effect: informs user about storage availability or restrictions on Android 10+.
enables or disables keeping the screen ON during recording.

static_properties.text: Show rename dialog after recording is completed

dynamic_properties.effect: controls whether a rename dialog appears after recording stops.
sets the naming convention for new recording files.
shows estimated file size per minute of recording.
presents current audio encoding configuration (format, sample rate, etc.).
resets all audio settings to default values.
launches the app store page for rating the app.
opens an email intent for sending feature requests or feedback.
shows total number of saved recordings.
displays cumulative duration of all recordings.
shows available internal or external storage space for recordings.
displays about information including app version and license links.

activities.summary: The SettingsActivity is used to manage application settings, including audio configuration (format, sample rate, bitrate, channels), theme color selection, storage options, recording preferences, and app information. It also provides functionality for navigating to external resources like the app store or email client for feedback.

activities.name: com.dimowner.audiorecorder.app.setup.SetupActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: changes application theme dynamically and persists the selected theme key
sets the naming format for recorded files and updates presenter accordingly
updates available sample rate and channel options based on the selected format via updateRecordingInfo()
updates the audio sample rate setting in the application through the presenter
updates the audio bitrate setting in the application through the presenter
updates the audio channel count (mono/stereo) through the presenter
enables/disables stereo recording and updates corresponding UI elements and settings
shows estimated file size per minute based on current settings

static_properties.text: WAV is uncompressed format and it takes a lot of space

dynamic_properties.effect: provides informational message about the currently selected recording format
resets all settings to default values and reloads them
applies current settings, starts MainActivity, and finishes SetupActivity

layouts.name: xx.xml (Not explicitly identified, but nameFormatSelector is linked to R.id.name_format)

activities.summary: The SetupActivity is used for configuring audio recording settings such as file format, sample rate, bitrate, and channel count. It also allows users to select a theme color and define a naming format for recordings. The activity includes Apply and Reset buttons to save or revert settings, and dynamically updates available options based on the selected format.

activities.name: com.dimowner.audiorecorder.app.main.MainActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: initiates file selection to import an audio file.
shows progress indicator during import operation.
indicates waveform processing is in progress.
displays waveform of existing recordings for playback.
displays real-time waveform during active recording.
shows progress bar during loading or operations.
starts audio playback.
stops ongoing playback or recording.
shows start time marker (00:00) for waveform alignment.
displays current recording or playback time.
allows renaming of the current audio file via dialog.
navigates to ActivityInformation to show detailed metadata.
shows total duration of selected audio file.
allows seeking within the audio playback timeline.
opens SettingsActivity for app configuration.
starts a new audio recording session.
finishes and saves the ongoing recording.
opens list of saved recordings for selection.

activities.summary: MainActivity serves as the primary interface for audio recording, playback, and management. It includes functionality for handling permissions, displaying UI elements based on states (recording, playback, importing), interacting with services like RecordingService and PlaybackService, and managing user interactions such as renaming, sharing, deleting, and opening files.

activities.name: com.dimowner.audiorecorder.app.TransparentRecordingActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used to check necessary permissions (RECORD_AUDIO and WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) and start the audio recording service. It operates transparently, finishing itself once permissions are granted and the service is started.

activities.name: com.dimowner.audiorecorder.app.lostrecords.LostRecordsActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: shows the toolbar containing navigation and title.
navigates back to the previous screen by finishing the current activity.
shows the title 'Lost records' at the top of the activity.
deletes all displayed lost records after user confirmation.
navigates to the FileBrowserActivity to explore the file system.

static_properties.text: Some records files was not found in the records directory. Possibly they was removed or moved.

dynamic_properties.effect: shows the list of lost records using a RecyclerView adapter.
shows an empty state message when there are no lost records to display.

activities.summary: The LostRecordsActivity is used to display a list of lost audio records that were not found in the expected directory. It provides functionality for viewing record details, deleting individual or all records, and navigating to a file browser. The activity uses an MVP architecture with a presenter managing data and updating the UI accordingly.
